**EC016-240247 Condensing Unit Replacement Dorchester: Invitation to Qualify**
=================================

**Event Information**
-------------------

* **Reference Number**: WS4047606178-Doc4075351984
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4047606178
* **Publication Date**: June 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 13, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: June 29, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 18, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

**Event Description**
-------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Correctional Services Canada (CSC) invites qualified contractors to provide construction services for the replacement of condensing units B4-B6 in three different sites within the Dorchester Penitentiary, Dorchester, New Brunswick.

The procurement is classified under the following UNSPSC categories:

* Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services (72000000)
* Air Conditioning Installation or Maintenance or Repair Service (72101511)
* Nonresidential Building Construction Services (72120000)
* Heavy Construction Services (72140000)
* Heating and Cooling and Air Conditioning HVAC Construction and Maintenance Services (72151200)
* Heating and Cooling and Air Conditioning HVAC Installation and Maintenance Service (72151207)
* Building Construction Management (81101513)

**Event Link**
--------------

This event is available in SAP Ariba. To access the event, please copy and paste the following link into your browser: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16717319](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16717319)

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For more information, please contact:

Grant, Stewart (SPAC/PSPC)
stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
